verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Psalm of David.) In Thee, O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> I have taken <S%H2620><s%> refuge; <S%H2620><s%> Let me never <S%H408><s%> <S%H5769><s%> be ashamed; <S%H954><s%> In Thy righteousness <S%H6666><s%> deliver <S%H6403><s%> me.

Incline <S%H5186><s%> Thine ear <S%H241><s%> to me, rescue <S%H5337><s%> me quickly; <S%H4120><s%> Be Thou to me a rock <S%H6697><s%> of strength, <S%H4581><s%> A stronghold <S%H4686><s%> to save <S%H3467><s%> me.
For Thou art my rock <S%H5553><s%> and my fortress; <S%H4686><s%> For Thy name's sake <S%H4616><s%> Thou wilt lead <S%H5148><s%> me and guide <S%H5095><s%> me.
Thou wilt pull <S%H3318><s%> me out of the net <S%H7568><s%> which <S%H2098><s%> they have secretly <S%H2934><s%> laid <S%H2934><s%> for me; For Thou art my strength. <S%H4581><s%>
Into Thy hand <S%H3027><s%> I commit <S%H6485><s%> my spirit; <S%H7307><s%> Thou hast ransomed <S%H6299><s%> me, O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H410><s%> of truth. <S%H571><s%>
I hate <S%H8130><s%> those who regard <S%H8104><s%> vain <S%H7723><s%> idols; <S%H1892><s%> But I trust <S%H982><s%> in the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

I will rejoice <S%H1523><s%> and be glad <S%H8055><s%> in Thy lovingkindness, <S%H2617><s%> Because <S%H834><s%> Thou hast seen <S%H7200><s%> my affliction; <S%H6040><s%> Thou hast known <S%H3045><s%> the troubles <S%H6869><s%> of my soul, <S%H5315><s%>

And Thou hast not given <S%H5462><s%> me over <S%H5462><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the enemy; <S%H340><s%> Thou hast set <S%H5975><s%> my feet <S%H7272><s%> in a large <S%H4800><s%> place. <S%H4800><s%>

Be gracious <S%H2603><s%> to me, O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> for I am in distress; <S%H9503><s%> My eye <S%H5869><s%> is wasted <S%H6244><s%> away <S%H6244><s%> from grief, <S%H3708><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> and my body <S%H990><s%> [also.]

For my life <S%H9132><s%> is spent <S%H3615><s%> with sorrow, <S%H3015><s%> And my years <S%H8141><s%> with sighing; <S%H585><s%> My strength <S%H3581><s%> has failed <S%H3782><s%> because of my iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> And my body <S%H6106><s%> has wasted <S%H6244><s%> away. <S%H6244><s%>

Because <S%H4480><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> my adversaries, <S%H6887><s%> I have become <S%H1961><s%> a reproach, <S%H2781><s%> Especially <S%H3966><s%> to my neighbors, <S%H7934><s%> And an object <S%H6343><s%> of dread <S%H6343><s%> to my acquaintances; <S%H3045><s%> Those who see <S%H7200><s%> me in the street <S%H2351><s%> flee <S%H5074><s%> from me.
I am forgotten <S%H7911><s%> as a dead <S%H4191><s%> man, <S%H4191><s%> out of mind, <S%H3820><s%> I am <S%H1961><s%> like a broken vessel. <S%H6><s%>

For I have heard <S%H8085><s%> the slander <S%H1681><s%> of many, <S%H7227><s%> Terror <S%H4032><s%> is on every <S%H5439><s%> side; <S%H5439><s%> While they took <S%H3245><s%> counsel <S%H3245><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> me, They schemed <S%H2161><s%> to take <S%H3947><s%> away my life. <S%H5315><s%>
But as for me, I trust <S%H982><s%> in Thee, O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> I say, <S%H559><s%> "Thou art my God. <S%H430><s%>"
My times <S%H6256><s%> are in Thy hand; <S%H3027><s%> Deliver <S%H5337><s%> me from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of my enemies, <S%H340><s%> and from those who persecute <S%H7291><s%> me.
Make Thy face <S%H6440><s%> to shine <S%H215><s%> upon Thy servant; <S%H5650><s%> Save <S%H3467><s%> me in Thy lovingkindness. <S%H2617><s%>

Let me not be put <S%H954><s%> to shame, <S%H954><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> for I call <S%H7121><s%> upon Thee; Let the wicked <S%H7563><s%> be put <S%H954><s%> to shame, <S%H954><s%> let them be silent <S%H1826><s%> in Sheol. <S%H7585><s%>

Let the lying <S%H8267><s%> lips <S%H8193><s%> be dumb, <S%H481><s%> Which speak <S%H1696><s%> arrogantly <S%H6277><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%> With pride <S%H1346><s%> and contempt. <S%H937><s%>

How <S%H4100><s%> great <S%H7227><s%> is Thy goodness, <S%H2898><s%> Which <S%H834><s%> Thou hast stored <S%H6845><s%> up for those who fear <S%H3372><s%> Thee, Which Thou hast wrought <S%H6466><s%> for those who take <S%H2620><s%> refuge <S%H2620><s%> in Thee, Before <S%H6440><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men! <S%H120><s%>

Thou dost hide <S%H5641><s%> them in the secret <S%H5643><s%> place <S%H5643><s%> of Thy presence <S%H6440><s%> from the conspiracies <S%H7407><s%> of man; <S%H376><s%> Thou dost keep <S%H6845><s%> them secretly <S%H6845><s%> in a shelter <S%H5521><s%> from the strife <S%H7379><s%> of tongues. <S%H3956><s%>
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> For He has made <S%H6381><s%> marvelous <S%H6381><s%> His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> to me in a besieged <S%H4692><s%> city. <S%H5892><s%>

As for me, I said <S%H559><s%> in my alarm, <S%H2648><s%> "I am cut <S%H1629><s%> off <S%H1629><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> Thine eyes <S%H5869><s%>"; Nevertheless <S%H403><s%> Thou didst hear <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my supplications <S%H8469><s%> When I cried <S%H7768><s%> to Thee.

O love <S%H157><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> you His godly <S%H2623><s%> ones! <S%H2623><s%> The Lord <S%H3068><s%> preserves <S%H5341><s%> the faithful, <S%H539><s%> And fully <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3499><s%> recompenses <S%H9608><s%> the proud <S%H1346><s%> doer. <S%H6213><s%>
Be strong, <S%H2388><s%> and let your heart <S%H3824><s%> take <S%H553><s%> courage, <S%H553><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> you who hope <S%H3176><s%> in the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>
